extension.name: Events Calendar Module for JomSocial
extension.author: Andrew Peeling
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) Andrew Peeling 2011. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Display JomSocial events in an events calendar module.

field.name: calendarJquery
field.label: Load jQuery?
field.description: You'll need to load the jQuery library to make the calendar work. However, if your template or another plugin is already loading jQuery, turning this off might avoid javascript conflicts.

field.name: calendarUI
field.label: Load jQuery UI?
field.description: You'll need to load the jQuery UI library to make the calendar work. However, if your template or another plugin is already loading jQuery UI, you can probably safely turn this off.

field.name: useAjax
field.label: Use Ajax?
field.description: Select 'Yes' if you want events loaded via Ajax. Select 'No' if you want the events loaded when the module loads.

field.name: textAllday
field.label: All Day Text
field.description: Set the text for all-day.

field.name: textToday
field.label: Today Text
field.description: Set the text for the 'today' button.

field.name: textMonth
field.label: Month Text
field.description: Set the text for the 'month' button.

field.name: textWeek
field.label: Week Text
field.description: Set the text for the 'week' button.

field.name: textDay
field.label: Day Text
field.description: Set the text for the 'day' button.

field.name: monthNames
field.label: Month Names
field.description: Set the text for the months. Separate each month name with a comma.

field.name: monthNamesShort
field.label: Short Month Names
field.description: Set the text for the abrreviated months. Separate each month name with a comma.

field.name: dayNames
field.label: Day Names
field.description: Set the text for the days. Separate each day name with a comma.

field.name: dayNamesShort
field.label: Short Day Names
field.description: Set the text for the abrreviated days. Separate each day name with a comma.

field.name: firstDay
field.label: First Day
field.description: Start the calendar week on 'Sunday' or 'Monday'?

field.name: eventPublic
field.label: Just Public Events?
field.description: Select 'Yes' to just show public events. Select 'No' to display public and private events.

field.name: pastEvents
field.label: Show Past Events?
field.description: Select 'Yes' to allow the calendar to display past events. Select 'No' to display only events that have not ended yet.

field.name: eventCatids
field.label: Limit By CatID
field.description: Enter a comma delimited list of catids you'd like the module to by limited to (i.e., 0,1,2,4). Leave blank to display all categories.

field.name: timeFormat
field.label: Time Format
field.description: Set the time format displayed. Check documentation for options.

field.name: headerLeft
field.label: Header Left
field.description: Set the left side header buttons.

field.name: headerMiddle
field.label: Header Center
field.description: Set the center header buttons.

field.name: headerRight
field.label: Header Right
field.description: Set the right side header buttons.

field.name: sefOption
field.label: SEF Url Override?
field.description: Select 'Yes' to enable event link override and create your own SEF event links below. See documentation for more info.

field.name: sefFormat
field.label: URL Format
field.description: Enter a SEF url format here, using [id] as a placeholder for the event item id. Example: http://spacerobotfive.com/community/viewevent.html?eventid=[id]

field.name: themeOption
field.label: Themeroller Override?
field.description: Select 'Yes' to enable the jQuery Themeroller override below. See documentation for more info.

field.name: themeCSS
field.label: Themeroller CSS URL
field.description: Enter the url of your Themeroller CSS file.
